summary: Antoine moves home to help his mom drive the mobile grocery, when his dad's hospitalized. He brings Claire along, hoping she'll become more than a friend. He drives around Provence's countryside, selling mainly to old people.
cast: Nicolas Cazalé|Clotilde Hesme|Daniel Duval|Jeanne Goupil|Stéphan Guérin-Tillié|Liliane Rovère|Paul Crauchet|Chad Chenouga|Ludmila Ruoso|Benoît Giros|Gilles Chabrier|Jean-Luc Boucherot|Gilberte Muguet|Christophe Mirabel|Odile Tommy Martin|Robert Fayard|Jemmy Walker|Robert Court|Robert Juventin|Agnès Joniaux|Arlette Caussidéry
title: Un verano en la provenza
